segments.text: What is your salary at present ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My present pay is 100,000 Yuan per year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are your salary expectations now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like to be paid more than that . Hopefully , 120,000 Yuan per year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a little more than we had planned .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think you'll find I'm worth that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can only offer you 110,000 Yuan a year . Raises will be given after a three-month probation according to your performance . Is that satisfactory ?
segments.speaker: S1
